About Automic's CA Agile Central Package ================================ CA Agile Central is an enterprise-class platform that's purpose-built for scaling agile development practices. It provides a hub for teams to collaboratively plan, prioritize and track work on a synchronized cadence. With this package we automate the following: * Create/Edit/Bulk edit/Delete a user story. * Add attachment/comment to the user story. * Export a user story
=Supported CA SV versions=
=Setup= * Oracle JRE 1.7 or higher must be installed on Agent OS and "java" must be set as executable on the same. * The Agent should be able to access CA Agile Central rest api endpoint URL in order to make HTTP requests.
=Variables= PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILE_CENTRAL.PUB.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS * API version and https port defined in this vara
=Actions= Following actions are supported for CA SV.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_USER_STORY * Action Description: This action deletes the given user story along with the tasks associated to it.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_USER_STORY * Action Description: This action use to create new user story.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.EDIT_USER_STORY * Action Description: This action use to edit a user story.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.ADD_COMMENT * Action Description: This action used to add comment to provided work Item.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_AGILECENTRAL.PUB.ACTION.ADD_ATTACHMENT * Action Description: This action used to add attachment to provided work Item.
